title: Jonny B'z Dogs and More
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, Fast food, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Hot dog shop that also offers a vegan sausage. Pay a flat price for your dog(s) and select your toppings: vegan chili, Amish relish, tomato, the usual condiments and more. While animal-products are prevalent, equal appearance of the veggie dog constitutes a strong vegan and vegetarian presence for the bulk of Johnny B'z mix-and-match menu. The shop's staff are veg-savvy.
